attributes.action: Allow childrens outdoor football to continue.
attributes.additional_details: It is excercise for people and good for mental health at a time when children can go to school anyway.
attributes.background: Allow childrens outdoor football or any sports to continue during lockdown with some restrictions in place.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169
